professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in SQL Server administration, data management, and high-availability solutions. Skilled in ETL processes, SSIS, SSAS, and SSRS. Proficient in TSQL programming and database optimization.

key_responsibilities: Administered SQL Server 2005-2014 instances across multiple environments.
Designed and maintained high-availability solutions using clustering and database mirroring.
Migrated databases from legacy systems to modern versions of SQL Server.
Performed daily database maintenance and optimization.
Implemented data masking and security hardening to meet HIPAA requirements.
Assisted in the migration of SQL Server 2005 to newer versions.
